definition: to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: Victorians saw a cleft palate as a defect that built character.
sentences.chinese: 維多利亞時代將齶裂視爲塑造特徵的缺陷。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate effects of repairing incomplete cleft palate with double island mucoperiosteal flap.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索雙島粘骨膜瓣修復不完全性齶裂的效果。

sentences.english: Where cleft palate occurs by itself, it is not possible to detect it before birth.
sentences.chinese: 如齶裂發生的本身，是不可能的檢測，它在出生之前。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the ultrasonic diagnosis of fetal cleft palate.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲診斷胎兒齶裂的價值。

sentences.english: Method Sixteen cases of cleft palate were repaired with bilateral buccal musculomucosal flaps.
sentences.chinese: 方法應用雙側頰粘膜肌瓣對齶裂進行修復手術。

sentences.english: A cleft lip or palate is not a curse or omen.
sentences.chinese: 脣裂或齶裂並非上天的詛咒，厄運的徵兆。

sentences.english: Objective To study the features of cleft palate speech in Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究齶裂患者發普通話語音的特點。

sentences.english: To analyze the influence factors of congenital cleft palate repair.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析影響先天性齶裂手術效果的因素。

sentences.english: There were some substitutive sounds of the pronunciation positio…
sentences.chinese: 結論傳統語音學是齶裂語音研究的基礎。

sentences.english: Cleft lip and palate is one of the most common congenital malformation.
sentences.chinese: 脣齶裂畸形是人類最常見的先天發育性缺陷之一。

sentences.english: No child needs to suffer with a clef.
sentences.chinese: 沒有那個孩子需要承受脣裂或齶裂的煎熬。

sentences.english: Unusual transformation of MEE cells can induce cleft palate.
sentences.chinese: MEE細胞的異常轉歸將導致齶裂發生。

sentences.english: Cleft lip and palate is the most frequent congenital defect in China.
sentences.chinese: 兔脣和齶裂在中國是最常見的缺陷。

sentences.english: Further more, the acoustic impedance examination showed most cleft palate patients accompanied with conductive deafness.
sentences.chinese: 並且多數齶裂患者伴發傳導性耳聾。

sentences.english: Chilopalatognathus is the most frequent congenital development malformation of oromaxillo-facial region.
sentences.chinese: 脣齶裂是最常見的口腔頜面部先天性發育畸形。

sentences.english: There are varieties methods to evaluate velopharyngeal function of the cleft palate patient after surgery.
sentences.chinese: 齶裂術後評價齶咽閉合功能的方法多種多樣。

pinyin: A1 er3 ci2 hai3 mo4 bing4

definition: to help a mother give birth

pinyin: dian4 nao3 duan4 ceng2 sao3 miao2

definition: medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
